original_text: The people in the crowd saw Jesus and immediately they were very surprised. They ran to say ‘hello’ to Jesus.
korean_text: 온 무리가 곧 예수를 보고 매우 놀라며 달려와 문안하거늘

sentences.original_text: The people in the crowd saw Jesus
and immediately they were very surprised
They ran to say 'hello' to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수께 인사를 하기 위해 달려갔다
